txt.en: You have destroyed the coal intended to fuel the forges of Uzbad-bakân, hindering the armour and weapon-craft of Moria's Orcs.
You have discovered the forges of Uzbad-bakân, a formidable facility for the creation of weapons and armour. The fuel for the fires should be destroyed at once.
You have destroyed the coal intended to fuel the forges of Uzbad-bakân, hindering the armour and weapon-craft of Moria's Orcs.
You have discovered the forges of Uzbad-bakân, a formidable facility for the creation of weapons and armour. The fuel for the fires should be destroyed at once.
Boxes of coal can be found in the forges of Uzbad-bakân in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should destroy boxes of coal to hinder the weapon and armour-crafting of the Orcs of Moria.
Boxes of coal can be found in the forges of Uzbad-bakân in Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should destroy boxes of coal to hinder the weapon and armour-crafting of the Orcs of Moria.
